Foundation

Home Page 2

Welcome to Foundation

Foundation is a tool designed to help incoming Computer Science students build confidence in algebra, trigonometry, and geometry as a strong foundation for success in Calculus I, II, and III.

About Me

My name is GraceAnna Akparanta, and I am studying Computer Science at the CUNY College of Staten Island. I created this project because I noticed that many students were leaving the major due to challenges in mathematics. My goal is to provide a supportive resource that makes math less intimidating and helps students continue their journey in computer science.

Why This Project?

This site was created as part of the Coding It Forward: Discovery Program. During the program, students were encouraged to create a deliverable that contributes to the public interest. I chose to build this webpage to support my peers and future students who may struggle with math. I believe making STEM education more accessible is a form of public interest technology.

Acknowledgements

I would like to thank my mentor for their guidance, patience, and encouragement throughout this process. Their support has been invaluable, and this project would not have been possible without their insights.
